title: Himi 31
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Sīsū ‘oku mau tokanga
Ki he ‘Afiona,
Ko homau Huhu’i koe
‘I he’emau hia.
2.
Ko e ‘Eiki anga’ofa
Ki he laumālie,
‘O e kakai angahia
Mo e li’ekina.
3.
Pea ‘oku mau kōlenga
Ki he ‘Afiona
Ke ke fakahā ho’o ‘ofa
Ki he kau masiva.
4.
Pea ke nau siofia
‘A e ‘Afiona,
‘I he teunga pani toto
‘I he’emau hia.
5.
Ka ke foa ‘a e maka
‘O e loto kovi,
Pea nau ongo’i leva
Ho’o ngāue lelei.
6.
Ke ke fakahā ho nima,
Pea mo ho va’e,
Pea mo ho vakavaka
Na’a nau hoka’i. *
